            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_12" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_44" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1675733807__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1675733807__tab0" class="dropdown-text">甚麼是成員延續安排？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1675733807__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_69">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_93" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_48" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">滙豐綜合公積金下的成員延續安排的特點，是可供合資格成員在終止參與僱主的退休計劃時，轉移並保留其權益於成員延續賬戶內。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_45" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="51274373__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="51274373__tab0" class="dropdown-text">我是一名僱員，如果想參加滙豐綜合公積金成員延續安排，有甚麼方法？有收費嗎？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="51274373__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_70">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_94" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_49" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">如果您將會離職及終止參與僱主的界定供款計劃之成員身分，請與您的僱主查詢該選項是否適用於您的計劃。<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">如果選項適用而您亦決定作出此安排，請在您的「成員離職申報表」的「可享有權益安排」部分中指明您欲轉移權益到滙豐綜合公積金成員延續安排，並填寫「成員延續賬戶申請表」。就有關適用於您的轉移權益的條款及細則，請參閱上述兩份表格。<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">您不需繳付任何手續費。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    

</div>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_95" class="cc-column">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    <div class="anchor" id="crs"></div>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_71">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-66-33  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_96" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">

    
    <div class="anchor" id="gong-tong-hui-bao-biao-zhun-jian-cheng-crs"></div>


<h2 class="heading A-TYP28L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="content_main_heading_14">
    共同匯報標準（簡稱「CRS」）
</h2>
</div>

        
    


        </div>
    
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_97" class="cc-column">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_72">
    
    <div class="cc cc-columns-66-33  ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_98" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ACCRD-RW-RBWM row" role="region"><div>
    
    <div id="content_main_accordion_13" class="accordions-container sm-12">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_46" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1082654944__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1082654944__tab0" class="dropdown-text">甚麼是共同匯報標準「CRS」？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1082654944__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_73">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_99" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_50" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">共同匯報標準（簡稱「CRS」）是為打擊逃稅和維護有效稅制而制訂的資料收集及申報新規例，參與稅務管轄區的金融機構都必須遵守。CRS框架由經濟合作與發展組織頒布。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_47" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1296835276__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1296835276__tab0" class="dropdown-text">哪些人士的資料須予申報？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1296835276__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_74">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_100" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_51" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">CRS旨在確定客戶的稅務居住地，根據CRS規定，金融機構必須辨識稅務居住地有別於銀行賬戶及產品所在地的客戶，並向當地稅務機關申報有關資料。而該些資料或會被傳送給客戶稅務居住地的稅務機關。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_48" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-718181352__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-718181352__tab0" class="dropdown-text">為何滙豐需要了解我的稅務居住地所在稅務管轄區？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-718181352__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_75">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_101" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_52" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">根據CRS規定，我們有義務申報強積金／職業退休註冊計劃賬戶持有人及控權人任何於香港以外並須申報的稅務居住地。<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">例如，當客戶開立新的強積金／職業退休註冊計劃或現況因某種原因有所改變，滙豐將要求您確認若干資料。此程序稱為「自我證明」。根據CRS，滙豐必須收集「自我證明」資料。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_49" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-2029352629__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-2029352629__tab0" class="dropdown-text">所有金融機構都必須如此嗎？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-2029352629__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_76">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_102" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_53" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">香港的所有金融機構（豁免者除外）都必須遵守CRS法規。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_50" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1875068572__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1875068572__tab0" class="dropdown-text">滙豐需要客戶提供和核實哪些資料？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1875068572__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_77">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_103" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_54" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">根據CRS規定，滙豐將要求客戶提供包括但不限於以下資料：<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>姓名</li> 
 <li>地址</li> 
 <li>出生日期（適用於個人和控權人）</li> 
 <li>居留稅務管轄區</li> 
 <li>稅務編號或具有等同功能的識辨編號（簡稱「TIN」）</li> 
 <li>註冊地╱成立地（適用於實體公司）</li> 
 <li>實體類別（適用於實體公司）</li> 
 <li>特定類別實體的控權人類別（適用於控權人）</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_51" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1929169392__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1929169392__tab0" class="dropdown-text">如何判定稅務居住地？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1929169392__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_78">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_104" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_55" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">將視乎您的居住地以及個人具體情況而定。有關判定您的稅務居住地的詳情，請向您的專業稅務顧問諮詢或瀏覽<a href="http://www.oecd.org/tax/automatic-exchange/crs-implementation-and-assistance/tax-residency/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">經合組織自動交換財務賬戶資料網站</span><span class="visuallyhidden">經合組織自動交換財務賬戶資料網站  內容將於新視窗顯示</span></a>（只提供英文版本），滙豐無法提供稅務建議。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_52" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1322240654__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1322240654__tab0" class="dropdown-text">CRS個人自我證明表格要求填寫的內容與此前就FATCA（只適用於職業退休計劃賬戶持有人）提供的資料相似。FATCA和CRS有何不同？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1322240654__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_79">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_105" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_56" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">即使您已根據美國政府《外國賬戶稅務合規法案》（簡稱「FATCA」）提供所需資料，您仍可能需就CRS提供額外資料，因為兩者是不同的法規，要求亦有所不同。<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">FATCA是美國法例，要求金融機構識別美國人士並按FATCA《跨政府協議》法規申報資料；而CRS則要求金融機構識別客戶的所有稅務居住地，並於需要時申報香港以外的客戶資料。<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">此外，CRS框架由經濟合作與發展組織頒布（OECD），要求金融機構識別定我們所有客戶的稅務居民身份，並且在大多數情況下，報告看似是其賬戶和產品所在國家、地區或司法管轄區以外的稅務居民的客戶的信息。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_53" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-2110627435__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-2110627435__tab0" class="dropdown-text">我在居住地納稅，為何仍需根據CRS提供這些資料？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-2110627435__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_80">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_106" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_57" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">根據CRS規定，我們有責任確定所有客戶的稅務居住地，即使您的稅務居住地與持有賬戶所在地同樣於香港的客戶。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_54" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1263742800__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1263742800__tab0" class="dropdown-text">根據CRS，我需要多久提供這次資料一次？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1263742800__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_81">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_107" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_58" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">當我們已存檔您的完整及有效的「自我證明」，僅會在您更新若干賬戶資料或我們相信您的CRS相關資料有變時，要求您再次填寫個人自我證明表格。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_55" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="2010387587__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="2010387587__tab0" class="dropdown-text">為何滙豐要向稅務機關提供我的稅務資料？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2010387587__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_82">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_108" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_59" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">根據CRS參與稅務管轄區的法律要求，滙豐必須申報您的稅務資料。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_56" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1001907790__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1001907790__tab0" class="dropdown-text">滙豐是否會保護我的個人資料私隱？我的資料是否安全？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1001907790__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_83">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_109" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_60" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">是。我們僅會於法律規定下向相關稅務機關披露您的資料。<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">客戶資料受嚴格的保密及保安守則保護，所有滙豐集團成員、其僱員及第三方均須遵守。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_57" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="2126092355__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="2126092355__tab0" class="dropdown-text">我已提交所需資料，為何仍需提供文件證據？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="2126092355__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_84">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_110" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_61" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">我們需要核實您於自我證明中提供的資料。我們可能需要您提供護照複印本以核實身分，又或提供其他證明文件證明您於「自我證明」中所述的稅務居住地屬實。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_58" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1988461281__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1988461281__tab0" class="dropdown-text">哪些資料要向稅務機關申報？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1988461281__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_85">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_111" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_62" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">自我證明表格中提供的資料，以及您所持滙豐賬戶和產品的詳情，包括但不限於：<br> </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>結餘或總價值</li> 
 <li>投資回報總款額或支付款項</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>

    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_59" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1034538497__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1034538497__tab0" class="dropdown-text">參與CRS的國家╱地區有哪些？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1034538497__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_86">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_112" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_63" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">關於參與稅務管轄區的完整名單及其開始交換資料的日期等資訊，請瀏覽<a href="http://www.oecd.org/tax/automatic-exchange/crs-implementation-and-assistance/crs-by-jurisdiction/" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">經合組織自動交換財務賬戶資料網站</span><span class="visuallyhidden">經合組織自動交換財務賬戶資料網站  內容將於新視窗顯示</span></a>（只提供英文版本）。</p>

            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_60" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="1589018467__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="1589018467__tab0" class="dropdown-text">我是否必須提供我的稅務居民資料？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="1589018467__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_87">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_113" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_64" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">根據香港法例，如果您有任何強積金╱ 職業退休註冊計劃賬戶，我們可能會透過信件要求您提供您的稅務居民資料。<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">更多有關CRS的資訊，請參閱<a href="http://www.crs.hsbc.com/zh-hk/rbwm/hongkong?vid=019522eb45bb003d90d0458488600007b0021073007e8_hk&sid=1740047599035" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">滙豐香港CRS網站</span><span class="visuallyhidden">滙豐香港CRS網站  內容將於新視窗顯示</span></a>。</p>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        
    

</div>
        </section>
    </div>

    </div>

</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV O-ADVEXP-RW-RBWM row" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_advanced_expander_61" class="sm-12 clear-float">
        
    <div class="anchor" id="q-2"></div>

        
    
    <div class="A-EXPCNT-RW-RBWM expander">
        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1154567617__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1154567617__tab0" class="dropdown-text">哪裡可以獲取更多資訊與建議？ </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1154567617__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_88">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_114" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_65" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">有關您的稅務居住地的更多資訊，請參閱各稅務管轄區稅務機關發布的稅務居住地相關規定。您可瀏覽以下網站，了解相關資料。<br> </p>

    <h3 aria-label="重要事項" class="A-TYP28L-RW-ALL">重要事項</h3>
    <div class="genericModalBody parsys">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text"><div data-zone="America/New_York" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" id="genericModalBody_richtext_1">
    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>滙豐綜合公積金為集成職業退休計劃，於1992年在百慕達成立。</li> 
 <li>滙豐綜合公積金包括其所有投資組合是由滙豐人壽保險（國際）有限公司（「滙豐人壽」）發出的保單構成。因此，您的投資組合將受滙豐人壽的信用風險所影響。</li> 
 <li>如您的計劃是界定供款計劃，支付予您的僱員及成員延續安排下的成員（如下所述）的權益是根據投資組合的表現變動，並按滙豐綜合公積金的條款及細則而計算。每項投資組合有其特有的投資目標及相關風險。</li> 
 <li>如您的計劃是界定利益計劃，您補充應付給僱員的任何權益的責任是根據預先訂立的權益公式，及進行精算估值，並按滙豐綜合公積金的條款及細則而計算。每項投資組合有其特有的投資目標及相關風險。</li> 
 <li>僱主可選擇以信託安排參與滙豐綜合公積金，但即使在信託安排下，所委任的信託人只會持有由滙豐人壽發出的保單，您的投資仍受滙豐人壽的信用風險所影響。</li> 
 <li>此外，滙豐綜合公積金設有一個名為「成員延續安排」的特點。成員延續安排可供合資格成員在終止參與僱主的退休計劃時，轉移並保留其權益於成員延續賬戶內。滙豐綜合公積金下的成員延續安排亦以保單形式成立，而有關保單乃在信託安排下由信託人代有關成員持有。但即使在信託安排下，所委任的信託人只會持有由滙豐人壽發出的保單，您的投資仍受滙豐人壽的信用風險所影響。有關信託安排會受信託契約及有關保單（在明確納入構成該信託契約的範圍內）的條款管限。<br> </li> 
 <li>不論是否以信託安排成立，滙豐綜合公積金包括其投資組合是以保單構成，因此您並非投資於相關投資基金╱資產，亦沒有滙豐綜合公積金的相關投資基金╱資產的任何權利或擁有權。</li> 
 <li>如您的參與是以信託安排成立，該安排會受信託契約及有關保單（在明確納入構成該信託契約的範圍內）的條款管限。</li> 
 <li>保本萬利基金的保證由滙豐人壽提供。因此，您於保本萬利基金的投資（如有）將受滙豐人壽的信用風險所影響。</li> 
 <li>保本萬利基金的保證將按有關保證特點運作。有關保證特點及條件的詳情，請參閱滙豐綜合公積金的「主要推銷刊物」內保本萬利基金的投資組合便覽。</li> 
 <li>中央公積金基金的保證由香港上海滙豐銀行有限公司提供。因此，您於中央公積金基金的投資（如有）亦將受香港上海滙豐銀行有限公司的信用風險所影響。<br> </li> 
 <li>中央公積金基金的保證將按有關保證特點運作。有關保證特點及條件的詳情，請參閱滙豐綜合公積金的「主要推銷刊物」內中央公積金基金的投資組合便覽。</li> 
 <li>由2010年6月1日起，中央公積金基金不再接納新供款或資金。</li> 
 <li>在作出投資選擇前，您必須衡量個人可承受風險的程度及您的財政狀況。在挑選投資組合時，如您就某一項投資組合是否適合您（包括是否符合您的投資目標）而有任何疑問，請徵詢財務及╱或專業人士的意見，並因應您的個人狀況而挑選最適合您的投資組合。</li> 
 <li>您應該參閱有關「主要推銷刊物」，不應只根據這網頁顯示的資料而作出投資。</li> 
 <li>投資涉及風險。往績不能作為未來表現的指標。金融工具（尤其是股票及股份）之價值及任何來自此類金融工具之收入均可跌可升。有關詳情，包括產品特點及所涉及的風險，請參閱「主要推銷刊物」。 </li> 
 <li>如對「主要推銷刊物」內容的涵義或效力有任何疑問，請徵詢獨立專業人士的意見。</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>
